gmcm.enable_combo_hits.title: Enable Melee Combo Hits
gmcm.enable_combo_hits.desc: Replaces vanilla weapon spam with a more strategic combo system.
gmcm.combo_hits_per_weapon_type.defense_: The max. number of consecutive hits in a Sword combo.
gmcm.combo_hits_per_weapon_type.club.des: The max. number of consecutive hits in a Club combo.
gmcm.swipe_hold.title: Enable Hold-To-Swipe
gmcm.swipe_hold.desc: Allows performing combos by simply holding the tool button instead of spam-clicking.
gmcm.hyperbolic_mitigation_formula.title: Use Hyperbolic Mitigation Formula
gmcm.hyperbolic_mitigation_formula.desc: Replaces the linear damage mitigation formula with a diminishing curve that gives more impactful but returns from each defense stat. BEFORE: Damage -= Defense; AFTER: Damage *= 10 / (10 + Defense)
gmcm.defense_improves_parry.title: Defense Improves Parry Damage
gmcm.defense_improves_parry.desc: Parry damage (sword special move) is increased by the defense stat.
gmcm.crits_ignore_defense.title: Crits. Ignore Defense
gmcm.crits_ignore_defense.desc: Critical strikes ignore the target's defense stat.
gmcm.critical_back_attacks.title: Critical Back Attacks
gmcm.critical_back_attacks.desc: Hits to an enemy's backside have double critical strike chance.
gmcm.knockback_hurts.title: Knockbacks Hurt
gmcm.knockback_hurts.desc: Adds collision damage when knocked-back enemies collide with a wall or obstacle.
gmcm.slick_moves.title: Slick Moves
gmcm.slick_moves.desc: Drift in the current running direction when attacking.
gmcm.face_mouse_cursor.title: Face Towards Mouse Cursor
gmcm.face_mouse_cursor.desc: If using mouse and keyboard, turn to face towards the current cursor position when using a tool.
gmcm.varied_encounters.title: Varied Encounters
gmcm.varied_encounters.desc: Randomizes monster stats, subject to Daily Luck bias, adding variability to monster encounters.
gmcm.monster_spawn_chance_multiplier.des: Multiplies the chance to spawn enemies in dungeons.
gmcm.monster_health_multiplier.title: Health Multiplier
gmcm.monster_health_multiplier.desc: Multiplies the health of all enemies.
gmcm.monster_damage_multiplier.title: Damage Multiplier
gmcm.monster_damage_multiplier.desc: Multiplies the damage dealt by all enemies.
gmcm.monster_defense_multiplier.title: Defense Multiplier
gmcm.monster_defense_multiplier.desc: Multiplies the damage resistance of all enemies.
gmcm.monster_health_summand.title: Added Health
gmcm.monster_health_summand.desc: Adds to the health of all enemies (before multiplier).
gmcm.monster_damage_summand.title: Added Damage
gmcm.monster_damage_summand.desc: Adds to the damage dealt by all enemies (before multiplier).
gmcm.monster_defense_summand.title: Added Defense
gmcm.monster_defense_summand.desc: Adds to the damage resistance of all enemies (before multiplier).
